title: LOOK NO FURTHER! 1x1 Loft! with Large Patio!
posting_body: Call Now -
show contact info
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 795 Sq.
Ft.
A NEW BEGINNING AWAITS YOU AT ELAN 41
The newly remodeled residences at Elan41 in West Seattle offer plenty of privacy in a bustling, community setting.
Open decks boast beautiful views spanning from Elliott Bay and the Olympics Mountains to the city skyline and the Cascade Mountains.
With a WalkScore of 92, there’s a whole new world just around the corner.
Spacious one, two-bedroom and loft apartments, have a fresh, contemporary feel and include contemporary finishes and modern appliances.
The beautiful courtyards offer an outdoor gathering place with ample seating and community BBQ's.

Take a few steps outside your front door and you’ll land at the West Seattle Junction – where you’ll soon find your favorite nook to sip coffee and read, your favorite bistro to meet friends for dinner, or your favorite bar where everybody knows your name.
And there’s culture, lots of culture.
Vintage clothing shops, music shops with all your favorite nostalgic albums, one-of-a-kind gifts, contemporary and mid-century furniture…you can find it all in the center of the Junction.
It’s just steps from your front door!
Looking for something to do on a rainy day?
Visit
ArtsWest.
In addition to compelling plays shown throughout the year, the space includes an ever-changing gallery featuring local artists.
Ready for a night out on the town?
Whether you’re into pub-style or five-star fun, there are plenty of options just a couple of steps away.
Have your dog with you?
No fear… your pooch is welcome at several eateries along the Junction.
There’s truly something for everyone in the heart of West Seattle.
And it all starts at Elan41.
Features:

Garbage Disposal, Stainless Steel Appliances, Additional Storage, Kitchen Island *, California Closets *, Spectacular Views of the Olympic and Cascade Mountain Range, Puget Sound, and Downtown Seattle *, Private Balcony/Patio, In-Home Washer and Dryer, Stainless-Steel Appliances, Granite Counter-tops, Dishwasher, Lofted Ceilings
*Select Homes*
Community Amenities:

24-Hour Online Maintenance Request Submittals, 24-Hour Fitness Center, Game Lounge, Business Center, Newly Renovated Luxury Clubhouse, Pet Friendly, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Close Proximity to Shopping & Dining, Professionally Managed, WalkScore of 95, Pet Wash Station!, 24-Hour Package Lockers with Amazon HUB, WiFi Available, On-Site Dog Park, Bicycle Storage, Brand New Outdoor Grilling and Barbecue Stations, Community Courtyard, Fire Pit Lounge
Pet Policy
Pet friendly, contact for details and breed restrictions
